programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: Sheriff Swanson takes to the streets of Wayne County with the K-9 and Morality team in a proactive operation. The team's skilled K-9 units play a crucial role, and their keen senses detect illegal substances with impressive accuracy.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure with Sheriff Swanson and Wayne County's Special Operations Unit in an undercover operation.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.sub-title: The Sheriff with style: Gary McFadden
programme.desc: "In Mecklenburg County, North Carolina, there's a dynamic and charismatic Sheriff: Gary McFadden. Known for his distinctive style and genuine Southern charm, Sheriff McFadden's dedication to justice is only matched by his heart of gold.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: Witness their strategic brilliance and physical prowess as they engage in a meticulously planned Hostage Extraction Exercise. This unique behind-the-scenes access provides an unfiltered view of the precision, teamwork, and sheer determination required during these high-stakes situations.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: Sheriff Chris Swanson goes on an intense ride-along with a dedicated team of law enforcement officers. Their mission? To traverse the vast expanse of Mecklenburg County in pursuit of individuals who have outstanding arrest warrants.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: Embark on a historical tour of Sandusky's old jail, a place steeped in stories of the past. Venture into the depths of the former dungeons and ascend into the courthouse attic, unearthing the rich history and hidden narratives entwined within these iconic structures.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: "Follow an intense SWAT team training session led by Major Nick, an expert in tactical operations. Next up, a friendly shooting contest between Sheriff Swanson and Sheriff Chris Hilton, injecting a dose of friendly rivalry into their professional rapport.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: Step into the thrilling world of law enforcement with Sheriff Chris Swanson as he bravely dons the protective bite suit and experiences the formidable power of a trained K-9 unit firsthand.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: His dedication goes beyond maintaining law and order; it extends to fostering strong relationships within his community, reflecting his belief in a sheriff's role as a protector, a neighbor, and a friend.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: Sheriff Swanson and Deputy Cage immerse themselves in local camaraderie at a neighborhood bar, fostering conversations around community and a possible poltergeist! Then, Sheriff Ortega provides an insightful overview of the SWAT team's operations.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.sub-title: Major Drug Bust: Thousands of Pills!
programme.desc: In a sweeping sting operation, Eddy county's dedicated team made their mark on the war against drugs. The operation results in a monumental bust of a local fentanyl dealer, disrupting a significant supply chain.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: Sheriff Mark Cage sheds light on his role within the county and discusses his deep-rooted community involvement. The conversation takes a familiar turn as Chris interviews Cage's son, delving into the dynamics of working together in the sheriff's office and the mutual respect that binds them.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: In a tense encounter, Sergeant Jones pulls over a disgruntled Manny for careless driving. With the assistance of the K-9 unit, suspicions arise of potential drug involvement.

programme.title: Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: During a night patrol, Sheriff Swanson, Deputy Chris Carone, and his K-9 partner, Cratos, encounter an unexpected situation. The routine patrol takes a thrilling turn when they stumble upon a suspicious residence known as a hot house.
